body.name: SAPLOS Radeon RX 550 Low Profile Graphics Card, 4GB GDDR5 128-bit, HDMI VGA DVI-D, Video Card for PC Gaming, Computer GPU, DirectX 12, Low Power
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
features: 🎮【4GB/GDDR5/128-bit】The 4g video card is powerful for Polaris architecture with14nm process, with 512 stream processors, and 128-bit 4GB GDDR5 memory, 6Gbps memory speed . The basic frequency is 1183 MHz.

✔️【Easy to Install】The pice graphics card is suitable for sff, mini or mid tower cases which saving case's space. Just remove VGA port and change low profile bracket is fit mainstream ITX or ATX motherboard. (Package includes a pair of brackets. If it missing, contact us please.)

🖥️【Multi-screen Display】The baffle is equipped with 3 mainstream ports, VGA, HDMI and DVI to ensure compatibility with mainstream monitors. It can support up to 3 displays at the same time. Good for 3D CAD, CAM work, video or images editing.

😊【Excellent Craftsmanship】A heat-resistant aluminum heat sink is placed inside, combined with a small fan that quickly dissipate heat and control the temperature. The shell of gpu covers whole the PCB backplane to prevent the component from dirt ingress.

🍃【Real entry-level Gaming GPU】Dual silent heat dissipation fans runs slow, providing a quiet desktop for work and gaming experience. The gaming video card supports 1080p, 4K smooth output, which the performance of RX550 is better than R7 250.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Do you want to improve performance for your computer? If you just watch high-definition videos, browse pictures, play small or medium games. SAPLOS Radeon RX550 is good option for you on a budget. To improve your hardware equipment that extremely smooth gameplay and cinematic experiences.

Polaris GPU architecture Polaris is a new graphics architecture. Look for: increased levels of performance, smooth VR, seamless support for next-gen gaming monitors and CPU-free game streaming or recording. Small Form Factor The 4g video card has got single slot design. It can easily it low-profile and slim PC cases, and it is good for building an HTPC. This is very helpful for users who have a smaller form factor motherboard and do not want to waste an extra slot to the graphics card. Less Noisy A small quiet fan for cooling helps blow away heat from backplanes and electronics.
Web browsing, photo and video editing Multi-screen display support Support 4K and 1080p

Specification GPU Name Lexa Basic Description 4G GDDR5 128-bit Ports 1 x DVI-D, 1 x HDMI, 1 x VGA Core process 512 GPU Clock 1183 MHz Memory Speed 6000 MHz (1500x4 MHz) Board Power 50W Slot PCI Express x8 3.0 Supplementary Power Connectors No (plug and play) Recommended System Power 400W Maximum Digital Resolution 4096x2160 Pixel DirectX Support DirectX 12 Computing OpenCL, DirectCompute, DirectML Technology Vulkan, OpenGL 4.6 Manufacturer Chipset: AMD, Electronic component and board: SAPLOS

Q&A A: How to test or check the parameter of the graphics card? B: Our products are tested and inspected before shipping. I recommend using authoritative software of GPU-Z. A: Why does the memory speed display 1500 MHz in GPU-Z software, but it's described as 6000 MHz on Amazon? B: Because of GDDR5 data rate type, the amount of memory speed must be in multiply by 4, which is 6000 MHz.(If it's DDR3, memory speed is multiplied by 2) A: Why is GPU speed of the card not as it is said 1183 MHz? B: About GPU speed, it correlates with your CPU, motherboard, computer's accessories and power, also a game of scenes. GPU speed can reach up to 1183 MHz. A: Why does the card would not support multiple monitors? B: You need to set multiple monitors with the computer's system and update the drive from AMD website. A: Why does the card not compatible with PC, such as the display has lines, fan works but no display on monitor? Is the card dead? B: Graphics card you ordered from us is brand new. The caused problems may be the older CPU, power issue, wrong PCI Express slot and GPU installation, etc. Please check and update the newest drivers firstly. However, where problems still exist, try to install to another computer or change motherboard if possible. (If you have any concerns, we'll try to help you solve the difficulty.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking to get serious into gaming, this probably isn’t for you. But the value for the price is great, and if you just want to moderately upgrade your system, it works great.I currently have a pretty barebones PC which didn’t have a graphics card and also didn’t have a ton of space to accommodate larger graphics cards. This one fit perfectly in the tight space and was able to get the PC to play even new open world games with decent performance.Again, you’re not going to get top-of-the-line performance, but you’re also paying 1/10 of top of the line prices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great entry level card... easily adjusted video controls. Audio was best I've heard the the price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for Low Pro Budget Gaming Setup
reviews.reviewText: So… you PC game and you want to share it with your kids? Dell and other manufacturers make 9th generation intel processors that are good for low end systems, and you can pick them up for $300, and this budget GPU is the perfect match for them.Pros: PCIE power only. Single slot with no overhang. Almost whisper quiet.Cons: plays decently at 1080p output but at low settings and antialiasing off or very limited. Often you have to choose between vsync and AA at this resolution.Need to build a budget gaming setup for a child? This will fit the bill and also pay for itself if you consider steam sales for games. It’s about $550 up front for this setup mentioned but it’s cheap enough to invest in. My son has around 57 stream games and they cost me around $250 over time. That’s about $4.25 per game. Factoring the cost of the system setup, it’s about $7.50 per game. Great value for the patient consumer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It's very small and thin. Which I needed to fit into an old Dell, it is truly single slot. I stuck it in my PC after swapping out the back plate for a low profile one and removing the vga, installed the RX 550 AMD drivers and it doubled the FPS in the game I was playing from 30 on low to 60 on high and that's all I wanted it for. Temps are in range for the card despite it's size. Also my PC only has a 180w power supply and this works just fine in it. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The jury is still out
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a gamer, so I can't comment on that aspect. The image is nice and crisp and works well with the various graphics and animation packages I use. Watching videos on my 4K TV and they look really really good, even low res AVIs.However, this card has some serious quirks. I have a Windows theme going, and whenever the pictures on the monitors change, they all blink rapidly over the course of two or three seconds. There have been times when the screen has just gone black for about the same length of time. At first, it was annoying but livable. Lately, however, they are happening more and more. In my experience, that means the card is getting ready to fail. We'll see.There are absolutely no instructions anywhere for this card, not even a recommended location to download drivers. That's not a problem if you're experienced with PCs, but if you aren't, that could be a stumbling block.I am also irritated that they didn't include any SFF brackets. This is not a cheap card (granted, it's not an expensive card either). Selling them as an add-on seems unnecessary. (I happened to have an old card with brackets that fit.)I will probably continue to look for another card, though I'm hoping prices will become more reasonable.EDIT: Well, the card continued to decline until it locked up the PC. Swapped out and put in my old card, which at least works. I'll leave the rating at 3 stars and assume I just got a lemon, but I'm not impressed with the quality control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good buy for the money
reviews.reviewText: Works great in my old 990 mb with ddr3 ram....so long geforce

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not this brand.
reviews.reviewText: "Saplos" won't get any more from me. tried inn two towers. Same thing in both, won't load the driver. windows 10 gives a code 43 . Drivers failed to load on install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Breathing life into an old office machine.
reviews.reviewText: It might be overkill for what I am currently using it for. It now sits in a Dell optiplex as a sometimes streamer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Probably the best bang-for-the-buck for a SFF video card right now.
reviews.reviewText: I put this in a Dell Optiplex 3050 small form factor. The packaging is generic and the manual is clearly google-translated. Physical install was simple. The ability to take off or reroute the VGA port is important in the SFF case.After install the card worked immediately in windows 10 as a generic video port.The most difficult and time consuming part of this process was the subsequent downloading and installing of the Radeon driver and software from the AMD website. That would be the case with any card or manufacturer, though.My goal has been refurbishing business dells marked for recycling into a light gaming pcs for kids capable of running fortnite and rocket league decently on a single 1080p monitor. The games were literally unplayable before install and now they are as good or better than the PS4.Durability remains to be seen, but so far this is the best deal for a capable (even if somewhat old technology) 4gb ddr5 card. Highly recommend!

Schnelle Lieferung, funktioniert super. Einbau war leicht(i5-6500, elitedesk/sff Gehäuse), Grafikkarte wurde von win10 gleich erkannt und Treiber in Kürze automatisch installiert. Obwohl. Windows hat aber direkt nach der Einbau der Karte und Start des PCs nach recoveryKey verlangt!? Auf Handy habe ich mich in mein Microsoft Konto angemeldet und fand sofort den recoveryKey/Wiederherstellungsschlüssel. Sonst ging alles, wie vorhin beschrieben, von alleine. Bild ist wesentlich besser, pc schneller. Habe die Karte zur Entlastung des Prozessors gekauft, obwohl mein pc such 16gb ram Arbeitsspeicherhat, aber trotzdem. Vor allem für Bild- und Videobearbeitung vrauchebich sie. Alte Spiele zum Zeitvertreib sind aber auch wesentlich flüssiger geworden. Gute Karte für ältere aber gute PCs mit kleinem/mittlerem Gehäuse. Bin vorerst zufrieden. Danke.

reviews.reviewTitle: SAPLOS Radeon RX 550 Low Profile sottile e funzionale per piccoli case o PC ITX
reviews.reviewText: SAPLOS Radeon RX 550 Low Profile sottile e funzionale per piccoli case o PC ITX, non richiede alimentazioni extra e la qualità dell'immagine è in linea con le schede AMD RADEON sempre con ottimi colori, è adatta a un gaming leggero senza pretese (circa tre volte le prestazioni di una GT710), come codifica video H264 le prestazioni sono limitate, fa la metà di una GT710 (solo come codifica h264), ottima per ridare vita a vecchi pc o per sostituire le GPU integrate guaste o inutilizzabili, uscita nel 2017 può essere ancora utile, con le sue porte DVI, VGA e HDMI si adatta a vecchi e nuovi monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 2, 2023

reviews.reviewText: No soy muy exigente en la calidad gráfica de los juegos, pero con la tarjeta que tenía lo tenía que poner todo al mínimo. Con esta tarjeta ya puedo volver a subir la calidad de los juegos, incluso algunos funcionan con calidad máxima. Funciona bien el conector HDMI y funciona muy bien con el sistema operativo GNU/Linux. Me va a alargar la vida del ordenador unos cuantos años más.
